name: Dandy II Day Bed
description: Inspired by the original Dandy Bench by KIFU PARIS, the Dandy II day bed is the ultimate luxury seating. The seating area is inlaid in cream shagreen and the frame, legs and sides of the bench are completely inlaid in bronze-patina brass. On the left side of the day bed are arm and back rests upholstered in white vachette. Other versions are also available as part of the Dandy II Capsule. Handmade, featuring shagreen, Vachette and Bronze-Patina Brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
